Title: Establishes the New York state familial search policy and the release of information for familial DNA searches
Summary: Establishes the New York state familial search policy; relates to the release of certain information for familial DNA searches where a written agreement governing the use and dissemination of such DNA records exists.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the New York state familial search policy and the release of information for familial DNA searches
